Constructor

Mixins event emitter functionality to an object.

parameters
eventName {String} The name of the event.
returns
{Bool} Indication if we've emitted an event.

parameters
eventName {String} The events that should be listed.
returns
{Array} An array of listener functions

parameters
eventName {String} The event we want to remove.

on(eventName : String, fn : EventData -> Void) : Void

parameters
eventName {String} Name of the event.
callback {Functon} fn Callback function.
Register a new EventListener for the given event.

once(eventName : String, fn : EventData -> Void) : Void

parameters
eventName {String} Name of the event.
callback {Function} Callback function.
Add an EventListener that's only called once.

removeAllListeners(eventName : String) : Void

parameters
eventName {string} The event you want to remove all listeners for.
Remove all listeners or only the listeners for the specified event.
